title: Pet Friendly Charming Country Retreat in NSW
description: Escape to the countryside, far away from the hustle and bustle of the city and spend two nights at Clarendon Forest Retreat - a boutique property offering secluded and luxurious cottages in the middle of nature. Immerse yourself in the serene atmosphere of the Kiwarrak State Forest, just three hours' drive from Sydney, and reconnect with nature with family and friends and bring your fur baby with you as accomodation is pet friendly. Enjoy a complimentary bottle of wine on arrival and free parking onsite.
